metadata.title: CVE-2017-20006 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: UnRAR 5.6.1.2 and 5.6.1.3 has a heap-based buffer overflow inUnpack::CopyString (called from Unpack::Unpack5 andCmdExtract::ExtractCurrentFile).

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
